2164.subject: BUS
2164.descrlong:
Capstone course integrating all BUS core courses into the design of strategic analyses. Describes the strategic management process, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, and evaluation activities. Explores why good ethics is good business. Involves an action research project, domestic and international cases, and/or computer applications. (Offered only as interest warrants.)

[Prereq: BUS 308 and (BUS 309 or BUS 311 or BUS 312) and BUS 310 and (Junior or Senior Standing)]
